# Lab12

## Getting started

First, clone the repository containing this week's lab:

```
git clone https://gitlab.ccbr.utoronto.ca/UTORid/Lab12
```

(remember to replace UTORid with your actual UTORid)

## Submitting your work

After you are finished you with the lab you can commit and push it to gitlab using the same commands as previous weeks:
  
  ```
cd lab12
git commit -a -m "Completed Lab12"
git push
```
